content.en: Spectrum sensing optimization: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms to improve wideband spectrum sensing in cognitive radio networks. These algorithms, such as sub-Nyquist non-uniform sampling, compressed sensing, and adaptive spectrum sensing, aim to reduce power consumption, improve throughput, and optimize sampling rates. By applying these algorithms, researchers hope to enhance the performance and efficiency of spectrum sensing in cognitive radio systems.
content.da: Spektrumsensoroptimering: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer for at forbedre bredbåndsspektrumsensor i kognitive radionetværk. Disse algoritmer, såsom sub-Nyquist ikke-ensartet sampling, komprimeret sensing og adaptiv spektrumsensor, sigter mod at reducere strømforbruget, forbedre gennemstrømningen og optimere samplingshastigheder. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer håber forskerne at kunne forbedre ydeevnen og effektiviteten af spektrumsensor i kognitive radiosystemer.
